snippet: The Mets scheduled their first banner day in 16 years for May 27 before their game against San Diego.
abstract: New York Mets schedule their first banner day in 16 years for May 27 before their game against San Diego; Mets held banner day from 1963-96 and are restoring it as part of their 50th anniversary celebration; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Mets scheduled their first banner day in 16 years for May 27 before their game against San Diego.
